• {{ x.title }}
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from "@angular/core"; import { ToDo } from "src/app/todo.model"; @Component({ selector: "app-list", templateUrl: "./list.component.html", styleUrls: ["./list.component.css"], }) export class ListComponent { @Input() updatedList!: ToDo[]; change(x: ToDo) { if (!x.completed) { x.completed = true; }else{ x.completed = false; } console.log(x); } }
